mapper.sql: AGENT_ID, ERP_CODE, AGENT_NAME, HIERARCHY_ID, AGENT_STATUS,STATION_ID IS_VIRTUAL, PLAN_DATE, JOIN_DATE, CREATE_DATE, IS_DELETE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user_agent
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user_agent (AGENT_ID, ERP_CODE, AGENT_NAME, HIERARCHY_ID, AGENT_STATUS, IS_VIRTUAL, PLAN_DATE, JOIN_DATE, CREATE_DATE, IS_DELETE,STATION_ID) values (#{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hierarchyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVirtual,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}), #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

AGENT_ID,
ERP_CODE,
AGENT_NAME,
HIERARCHY_ID,
AGENT_STATUS,
IS_VIRTUAL,
PLAN_DATE,
JOIN_DATE,
CREATE_DATE,
IS_DELETE,
STATION_ID,

mapper.update:
update user_agent
AGENT_ID = #{record.agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERP_CODE = #{record.erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{record.agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIERARCHY_ID = #{record.hierarchyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_STATUS = #{record.agentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VIRTUAL = #{record.isVirtual,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PLAN_DATE = #{record.planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JOIN_DATE = #{record.joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STATION_ID = #{record.stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update user_agent set AGENT_ID = #{record.agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERP_CODE = #{record.erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_NAME = #{record.agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIERARCHY_ID = #{record.hierarchyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATION_ID = #{record.stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_STATUS = #{record.agentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VIRTUAL = #{record.isVirtual,jdbcType=TINYINT}, PLAN_DATE = #{record.planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JOIN_DATE = #{record.joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update user_agent
ERP_CODE = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIERARCHY_ID = #{hierarchyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_STATUS = #{agentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VIRTUAL = #{isVirtual,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PLAN_DATE = #{planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JOIN_DATE = #{joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STATION_ID = #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user_agent set ERP_CODE = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIERARCHY_ID = #{hierarchyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATION_ID = #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_STATUS = #{agentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VIRTUAL = #{isVirtual,jdbcType=TINYINT}, PLAN_DATE = #{planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JOIN_DATE = #{joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT(AGE.AGENT_ID), AGE.AGENT_NAME, AGE.AGENT_STATUS, AGE.CREATE_DATE, AGE.ERP_CODE, AGE.IS_DELETE, AGE.IS_VIRTUAL, AGE.JOIN_DATE, AGE.PLAN_DATE FROM user_agent AGE LEFT JOIN user_terminal TER ON AGE.AGENT_ID=TER.AGENT_ID LEFT JOIN system_station STA ON STA.STATION_CODE = TER.STATION_CODE LEFT JOIN security_user_station SUS ON STA.STATION_CODE = SUS.STATION_CODE LEFT JOIN security_user SUR ON SUS.USER_ID = SUR.USER_ID AND SUR.USER_ID IS NOT NULL
AGE.IS_DELETE=0
AND SUR.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY AGE.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT AGE.ERP_CODE as erpCode, AGE.AGENT_ID as agentId, AGE.AGENT_NAME as agentName, AGE.JOIN_DATE as joinDate FROM user_agent AGE
AGE.IS_DELETE=0
